Verb *ask*
***********

Documentation for the ask verb in */cmds/verbs/ask.c*.

Command
=======

USAGE

 |  ``ask <someone> about <something>``
 |  ``ask about <something>``
 |  ``ask biff about sword``

For asking vendors about their goods.
